scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Nativity, with the Virgin Mary kneeling in prayer beside a manger containing the Christ Child. An angel stands behind her, also in prayer. Several monks in hooded robes are gathered around, looking at the infant. In the background, a complex architectural structure is visible, featuring arches, domes, and decorative elements, suggesting a grand building. The presence of a cow and a donkey further reinforces the Nativity theme.
